sections.heading: Report; contents.On or before July 30, 2024, and by July 30 each year thereafter, each provider operating in this state shall submit a report to the Nebraska Broadband Office that provides specific information regarding each standard Internet service plan advertised by the provider and the rates ass
sections.text: Report; contents.On or before July 30, 2024, and by July 30 each year thereafter, each provider operating in this state shall submit a report to the Nebraska Broadband Office that provides specific information regarding each standard Internet service plan advertised by the provider and the rates associated with each such plan.SourceLaws 2024, LB1031, ยง 17.
